summary: The implementation covers most requirements comprehensively. All frontend sections (hero, profile, contact, education, projects, skills, hobbies, languages, references) are implemented with correct data. Backend functionality for file uploads is present. The main gap is the absence of the two required generated images in the frontend/public/assets/generated directory.

missing_requirements.requirement: Render generated profile photo and academic certificate background images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no files added to frontend/public/assets/generated/. The Home.tsx references '/assets/generated/profile-photo.dim_400x400.png' but the actual generated image files (profile-photo.dim_400x400.png and certificate-bg.dim_800x600.png) are not present in the file diff.
